Name: location_latitude
Computation Approach: Direct mapping from Navixy: lat (path: lat) - Latitude in decimal degrees from Navixy

Name: location_longitude
Computation Approach: Direct mapping from Navixy: lng (path: lng) - Longitude in decimal degrees from Navixy

Name: location_altitude
Computation Approach: Direct mapping from Navixy: alt (path: alt) - Altitude in meters from Navixy

Name: location_heading
Computation Approach: Direct mapping from Navixy: heading (path: heading) - Heading in degrees (0-359) from Navixy

Name: location_cardinal_direction
Computation Approach:
Calculated: derive from location_heading using derive_cardinal_direction function. Converts heading (0-359 degrees) to cardinal direction (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW).

Pseudo code:
dirs = ['N', 'NE', 'E', 'SE', 'S', 'SW', 'W', 'NW']
index = Math.floor((location_heading + 22.5) % 360 / 45)
cardinal_direction = dirs[index]
Description: Cardinal direction (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW)
JSON Structure: "string (N, NE, E, SE, S, SW, W, NW)"

Name: location_geocoded_address
Computation Approach:
Calculated: derive from location_latitude and location_longitude using derive_geocoded_address function. Uses external API (Google) to convert latitude and longitude coordinates into a geocoded address string.

Pseudo code:
coordinates = { lat: location_latitude, lng: location_longitude }
geocoded_address = callGoogleGeocodingAPI(coordinates)
return geocoded_address
Description: Single string representation of the location

Name: location_last_changed_at
Description: Unix Epoch timestamp (milliseconds, number) when location/heading last changed significantly (threshold applied to filter GPS noise). Used for dwell-time calculations and "parked since X" features.

Name: location_precision_fix_quality
Computation Approach: Direct mapping from Navixy: avl_io_69 (path: params.avl_io_69) - GNSS Status: 0 - GNSS OFF, 1 – GNSS ON with fix, 2 - GNSS ON without fix, 3 - GNSS sleep, 4 - GNSS ON with fix, invalid data
Computation Structure JSON:
"location_precision_fix_quality": [
{
"priority": 1,
"type": "direct",
"source_type": "provider",
"provider": "navixy",
"field": "avl_io_69",
"path": "params.avl_io_69",
"description": "GNSS Status: 0 - GNSS OFF, 1 – GNSS ON with fix, 2 - GNSS ON without fix, 3 - GNSS sleep, 4 - GNSS ON with fix, invalid data"
}
]
Description: 0 - GNSS OFF 1 – GNSS ON with fix 2 - GNSS ON without fix 3 - GNSS sleep 4 - GNSS ON with fix, invalid data

Name: location_precision_hdop
Computation Approach: Prioritized: Navixy hdop (path: hdop, priority 1), then Navixy avl_io_182 (path: params.avl_io_182, priority 2) - Horizontal Dilution of Precision
Computation Structure JSON:
"location_precision_hdop": [
{
"priority": 1,
"type": "direct",
"source_type": "provider",
"provider": "navixy",
"field": "hdop",
"path": "hdop",
"description": "Horizontal Dilution of Precision from hdop field"
},
{
"priority": 2,
"type": "direct",
"source_type": "provider",
"provider": "navixy",
"field": "avl_io_182",
"path": "params.avl_io_182",
"description": "Horizontal Dilution of Precision from avl_io_182"
}
]

Name: location_precision_pdop
Computation Approach: Prioritized: Navixy pdop (path: pdop, priority 1), then Navixy avl_io_181 (path: params.avl_io_181, priority 2) - Position Dilution of Precision
Computation Structure JSON:
"location_precision_pdop": [
{
"priority": 1,
"type": "direct",
"source_type": "provider",
"provider": "navixy",
"field": "pdop",
"path": "pdop",
"description": "Position Dilution of Precision from pdop field"
},
{
"priority": 2,
"type": "direct",
"source_type": "provider",
"provider": "navixy",
"field": "avl_io_181",
"path": "params.avl_io_181",
"description": "Position Dilution of Precision from avl_io_181"
}
]

Name: location_precision_satellites
Computation Approach: Direct mapping from Navixy: satellites (path: satellites) - Number of satellites in fix from Navixy
Computation Structure JSON:
"location_precision_satellites": [
{
"priority": 1,
"type": "direct",
"source_type": "provider",
"provider": "navixy",
"field": "satellites",
"path": "satellites",
"description": "Number of satellites in fix from Navixy"
}
]
